TopicTitle: Mission Logo (please? (also please don't move it) I'm counting on you guys!

Articles.Content:
Here's the deal:

I've got a mission that is currently on its way to the Mun. It is to do with my Munbase Missions (SESEOR)

If you awesome people want a crack at it...

Could you please include

-Julius (its the name of the station)

-SESEOR

Good luck guys!

I might be interested in doing this. Got any other resources, like screenshots of the craft involved, list of crew, and so on? And is this an insignia for a single mission (flight), or a whole series of flights?
Oooh! Interest! Its a insignia for one flight - the crew are Nelrim and Milmon and the mission is around the Mun. That's literally all I can provide you with - I hope its enough

And why should this be in General Discussion section of the forums?

It's not very generic to the game and its specific to you, so why should it not be moved?
That's good, I can work with that. I'll see what I can do, though if it turns complex I might have to sleep and finish up tomorrow afternoon.

Ok rodion, many thanks

"And why should this be in General Discussion section of the forums?

It's not very generic to the game and its specific to you, so why should it not be moved?"

Good question - I can't answer because last time whoever moved it didn't consider the reprocussions it would have on me and didn't even tell me why they'd moved it. But its fine, someones working one something so a) it hasn't just been soap bar'd and its not gonna get moved easily

Smiles all round

How's this? It's a standard mission insignia, complete with design cues shamelessly ripped from the shuttle-era NASA style for these patches. Apologies if it's rough around the edges, I don't work in any real vector programs so I just draw everything by hand in Photoshop.

This is beautiful - I'm using it right now. Will it be ok if I ask you some other time for some other insignias? That would be great!

Edited October 13, 2013 by Rhyunix
